name: Sniper (itch)
description:
BETA - I will continue to improve the game!

I made a new simple game! It's a clone of a game on miniclip.com (https://www.miniclip.com/games/sniper/en/#t-ss)

I used GameMaker Studio to create this game.

Links:

City Image: https://opengameart.org/content/city-background-repetitive-2

Sound (modified by me): https://freesound.org/people/kennysvoice/sounds/351777/

The other sprites I made on my own.
